    • getCorrectedGradient

      public double[] getCorrectedGradient()
      Computes the array of partial derivatives by survival parameters. Index is 3*node+i where i=GLDParameters.PARAMETER_DUPLICATION, GLDParameters.PARAMETER_GAIN, GLDParameters.PARAMETER_LOSS.
      Returns:
      gradient array
